pkgmetadata.longdescription: Yatchew (1997), De Chaisemartin D'Haultfoeuille (2024) Linearity Test // Test of linearity originally proposed by Yatchew (1997) doi:10.1016/S0165-1765(97)00218-8 and improved by de Chaisemartin D'Haultfoeuille (2024) doi:10.2139/ssrn.4284811 to be robust under heteroskedasticity.
